body:
Hello everybody,

Im after more help im afraid, but hopefully only a quick question.

Im following RwithR book and am attempting to do scene 2. On pages 161 and 163 of the book (I am trying to make some spotlights for the art gallery) it mentions that the IES photometric files i need are on the website. I cant find them! Can someone tell me where there are please.

I thought i had all the support files downloaded alreayd when i got radiance but as i did a file search and i didnt come up with anything, obviously not.

Thanks

Chris
